message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing an equal split of the money. This is fair for both of us and allows us to both walk away with a significant amount without risking more rounds of negotiation.

Alice, I appreciate the offer of an even split, but I believe my contributions to our project warrant a larger share. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's avoid further inflation and wrap this up now.

Bob, I understand you want more than an even split, but I need to look out for my interests too. Due to the 20% inflation affecting your gains, this offer actually gives you the equivalent of 360000 in round 1 value. If we continue to another round, inflation will reduce your purchasing power even further. This is a reasonable compromise that acknowledges your contributions while being fair to both of us.
